scenes.text:
Cardiff Uni Ice Skating Club (CUISC) is about people to try out skating, whether as a novice or a regular skater. It includes both hockey and figure skating.

All our sessions have coaches attending.

It is a great way to socialise and keep fit as well as trying something a little different.

We have training every Wednesday from 13:30 - 14:30 at Vindico Arena Cardiff. For socials and GIAGs keep an eye out on our SU page and instagram for up to date details, and keep an eye out for changes in the training schedule.
Our Standard Membership is £25.00 but we also have a half year/erasmus membership which is £15.00.
We have all sorts of socials, primarily themed pub/club nights but also discos and uncoached ice skating trips as sober socials! Keep an eye out on our social media for these annoucements.
